WELLINGTON , New Zealand -- Kiwi Income Property Trust Ltd. ( KIP.NZ ) on Tuesday reported a lower full - year net profit on internalization costs .
The company reported an after - tax profit of 101.3 million New Zealand dollars ( US $ 87 million ) in the full year to March 31 , down 7.7 % on the year .
It said unit holders will receive a full - year cash distribution of 6.40 New Zealand cents a unit , in line with guidance .

The company said , The New Zealand economy is growing positively , as is business and consumer confidence .
As a result , it is projecting a full - year cash distribution of 6.50 New Zealand cents a unit for the year to March 31 , 2015 .
